name: RPG Mega Coin Run
description:
Time is money, Money is time!

Can you survive in this cut throat world. As the clock ticks down the pressure is on buy yourself time with coins protected by the defender's, entities spawned into this world to protect the coins of value.

The higher value the loot... the stronger the defenders.

Why am I making this?

I run a youtube channel http://www.youtube.com/rm2kdev that is dedicated to teaching game development to anyone and everyone in a human and understandable way. I want to make this my main focus in life but it doesn't pay the bills so I thought I would make a game and release it.

I wanted to provide a way for the community to support my game development tutorials and also receive something in return.

Watch this game being built live!

I am livestreaming the entire development of this game over on twitch tune into http://www.twitch.tv/rm2kdev

Active Development

This game is still under development certain features are still not implemented I am taking requests from the community in the live twitch streams lets make this game awesome together.
